page_content: The page provides educational material about observing trees and their functions, including PDF assignments.
The page offers various PDF forms and guides related to tax declarations for the year 2021.
The page discusses the annual siren tests in Switzerland, specifically in the canton of Solothurn, and provides a PDF guide on what to do in case of an emergency.
The page provides tax declaration forms and guides for associations, foundations, and other legal entities for the year 2022.
The page provides information on how to apply for short-time work compensation, emphasizing that applications must be submitted digitally.
The page announces the 21st Chabishoblete event at Wallierhof, featuring a market and activities related to cabbage preparation.
The page summarizes the decisions made during the government council meeting on October 27, 2020, including various legislative changes.
